entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 02:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
